feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.53.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: reorder branches (#7581) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üß© Pieces

  • feat: DumplingAI Piece (#7577) @neo773
  • feat(microsoft-todo): 6 actions and 2 triggers (#7567) @onyedikachi-david
  • feat: Medullar Solutions piece (#7548) @mllopart
  • feat: add dappier piece (#7580) @amaan-ai20

üêû Bug Fixes

  • feat: skip cache for flow version when polling (#7651) @abuaboud
  • fix: added rerouting to the new runs page when browser navigates to /runs (#7628) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add neo773 as a contributor for plugin (#7641) @allcontributors
  • docs: add onyedikachi-david as a contributor for plugin (#7636) @allcontributors
  • docs: add mllopart as a contributor for plugin (#7630) @allcontributors
  • docs: add amaan-ai20 as a contributor for plugin (#7624) @allcontributors

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amaan-ai20, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr, @mllopart, @neo773 and @onyedikachi-david

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.53.1
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • fix: respaid - removed invoice_number from action validation (#7612) @mariiawidrpay

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: switching between pieces was triggering unnecessary saving (#7677) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: handshake and flow is disabled / onfleet imports (#7657) @abuaboud
  • refactor: fix webhook handshake & optmize webhooks (#7656) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @hazemadelkhalel and @mariiawidrpay

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.54.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(folders): revert back to left sidebar folders filter (#7710) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • feat: make quota exceeded retryable by storing trigger payload (#7702) @hazemadelkhalel

üß© Pieces

  • feat(metabase): add timeout so graph can load (#7701) @Kevinyu-alan
  • fix(subflow): only use callback url when the parent is waiting for re‚Ä¶ (#7704) @abuaboud
  • fix(dust): uploadFile piece compatibility with node v18 (#7691) @TimPetricola

üêû Bug Fixes

  • feat(migration): add externalId column to tables and fields in SQLite‚Ä¶ (#7716) @abuaboud
  • fix: generate webhook sample data via dialog by hitting /test (#7715) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix(flow): improve case-insensitive search for flow display names (#7714) @abuaboud
  • fix(project-state): skip overriding auth for empty trigger (#7712) @abuaboud
  • fix(project-releases): fallback to id in case external Id is not null (#7711) @abuaboud
  • fix(handshake): handle undefined payload by fetching data when necessary (#7705) @abuaboud
  • fix(subflow): only use callback url when the parent is waiting for re‚Ä¶ (#7704) @abuaboud
  • fix: hide the flow menu when flow name is hidden (#7703) @abuaboud
  • fix: increase timeout for flow-piece.test.ts (#7682) @hazemadelkhalel

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: enable filtering flows by connection (#7713) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: enhance project settings view (#7683) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • feat: revamp folders (#7699) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • fix: enhance ci workflow for nx (#7681) @hazemadelkhalel

üìö Documentation

  • docs: update handbook (#7685) @Louai-Zokerburg

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • refactor: move hubspot api client to piece package.json (#7698) @amrdb
  • refactor: move @aws-sdk/client-sns to piece package.json (#7695) @amrdb
  • chore(deps): bump axios and clarifai-nodejs-grpc in /packages/pieces/community/clarifai (#7697) @dependabot
  • refactor: delete more unused deps (#7696) @abuaboud
  • refactor: replace (& move) aws sdk with client-sqs in piece package.json (#7693) @amrdb
  • refactor: move pdf deps to piece package.json (#7688) @amrdb
  • refactor: move clarifai sdk to piece package.json (#7687) @amrdb
  • feat: introduce mcp telemetry (#7572) @Gamal72
  • refactor: move linear sdk to piece package.json (#7684) @abuaboud
  • refactor: move jimp & mailchain to local deps (#7645) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Gamal72, @Kevinyu-alan, @Louai-Zokerburg, @TimPetricola, @abuaboud, @amrdb, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @hazemadelkhalel and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.55.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: piece translation (#7738) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: agent piece (#7718) @Gamal72

üß© Pieces

  • feat: make table actions and triggers work with external ids (#7747) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat(microsoft-sharepoint): upload file action (#7746) @Daniel-Klippa
  • feat(slack): add links:* scope (#7744) @AdamSelene
  • feat(dropbox): download file action (#7740) @Daniel-Klippa
  • feat: adding fireflies.ai piece (#7607) @AnkitSharmaOnGithub
  • feat(dust): bump dust SDK version to re-allow creating conversation with empty messages (#7733) @AdamSelene
  • feat(dust): add custom api call action (#7720) @AdamSelene

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: retry run on latest version should not copy logs (#7752) @abuaboud
  • chore: update replace connections dialog message (#7736) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: prevent stale code by separating test and production run caches (#7725) @hazemadelkhalel
  • refactor: update webhook handler to improve payload saving logic (#7729) @abuaboud

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat(utils): add year in past dates (#7751) @7adidaz

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add Daniel-Klippa as a contributor for code (#7750) @allcontributors
  • docs: Add on-boarding check list (#7739) @Louai-Zokerburg

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • fix: add username to redis sentinel setup (#7721) @Djurredejong

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@7adidaz, @AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @AnkitSharmaOnGithub, @Daniel-Klippa, @Djurredejong, @Gamal72, @Louai-Zokerburg, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @hazemadelkhalel and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.56.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: allow both oauth2 grant types (#7768) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: added a method to override home button being clicked in embedding (#7803) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: added option to hide exporting and importing flows in embed (#7794) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: support resuming execution from the last state after container restart (#7622) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: change mcp to new auth spec (#7756) @Gamal72

üß© Pieces

  • feat(slack): 4 new actions and 3 triggers (#7414) @kishanprmr
  • fix: add tiktoken package to azure-openai piece package.json (#7802) @amrdb
  • feat(returning-ai): add forum channel send message action (#7799) @mg-wunna
  • fix(pipedrive): replace dropdown props with text fields to reduce API token usage (#7708) @kishanprmr
  • fix(convertkit): add desc sort and move params from body into queryParams (#7793) @nish17
  • feat(saleor): new piece implementation (#7640) @Kevinyu-alan
  • fix(gmail): fix new labeled trigger (#7787) @kishanprmr
  • feat: Adding Campaign Monitor Piece (#7665) @AnkitSharmaOnGithub
  • feat(exa): initial piece (#7780) @krushnarout
  • feat: Manychat Piece (#7582) @neo773
  • feat(piece-pdf-co): implement pdf.co community piece (#7603) @onyedikachi-david
  • feat(piece-coda): implement full coda piece with triggers and actions (#7605) @onyedikachi-david

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: failed unit tests (#7808) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: ignore patch version when comparing piece versions in project release diff (#7804) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: add tiktoken package to azure-openai piece package.json (#7802) @amrdb
  • fix: update textProcessor to handle empty values of required strings (#7792) @abuaboud
  • chore: switching embedding to use session storage instead of local storage (#7788) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: fetch all table records when listing (#7759) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: replace connections to be exact match (#7755) @abuaboud

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • fix: project switcher width (#7775) @Louai-Zokerburg

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add nish17 as a contributor for code (#7801) @allcontributors
  • docs: add krushnarout as a contributor for plugin (#7790) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • refactor: enhance version comparison logic in project diff service (#7807) @abuaboud
  • chore(deps): bump samlify from 2.9.0 to 2.10.0 (#7798) @dependabot
  • refactor: improve the flow changed function (#7806) @abuaboud
  • refactor: delete more unused deps (#7761) @amrdb
  • refactor: move "contentful-management" sdk to piece package.json (#7760) @amrdb
  • refactor: move tiktoken package to openai piece package.json (#7763) @amrdb
  • refactor: move actualbudget sdk to piece package.json (#7764) @amrdb
  • refactor: move dust client to piece package.json (#7765) @amrdb
  • refactor: move langchain packages to agent piece package.json (#7766) @amrdb
  • refactor: remove legacy outdated logic & group files (#7795) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AnkitSharmaOnGithub, @Gamal72, @Kevinyu-alan, @Louai-Zokerburg, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amrdb, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr, @krushnarout, @mg-wunna, @neo773, @nish17 and @onyedikachi-david
